description: A large plastic water canteen, with a 2.5 liter capacity and carrying strap.
A huge plastic barrel with a watertight lid.
A huge steel barrel with a watertight lid.
A massive steel barrel with a watertight lid.
A large and sturdy canvas sack.  Smells faintly of earth and hard work.
Small bag made of canvas.  Looks fine to store dried herbs in.
A small, open plastic bag.  Essentially trash.
A hefty plastic bag, made to carry lots of trash.  It's sturdy and waterproof, and could easily be repurposed.
A small but sturdy paper bag.  Rock solid when packed full with powder.
An inexpensive flexible rectangular storage bag on its typical small size.  Transparent and made of plastic, it can be sealed and opened by a slider which works in a similar way to a zip fastener.

An inexpensive flexible rectangular storage bag, noticeably larger than its more common counterpart.  Transparent and made of plastic, it can be sealed and opened by a slider which works in a similar way to a zip fastener.
A large, human size, rectangular bag made of strong plastic, with a zipper in the middle.  Used to hold a dead body.
A small, sealed plastic bag for liquids used in intravenous therapy.
A watertight glass bottle, holds 750 ml of liquid.
A watertight plastic bottle, holds 500 ml of liquid.  Some may be factory-sealed to increase shelf life.
An inverted plastic bottle for condiments.  Preserves content from rot until opened.
A watertight plastic bottle, holds 250 ml of liquid.
A small orange pill bottle with a white screw top.
A small white pill bottle with a screw top.
A small green pill bottle with a screw top.
It's a two-liter plastic bottle that can hold a lot of soda, or, nowadays, boiled water.
A clay bowl with a waterproofed hide lid.  Can be used as a container or as a tool.  Holds 250 ml of liquid.
A crude-looking wooden bowl which can hold some liquid.
A macabre-looking bowl made from the upper part of a skull.
SURGEON GENERAL'S WARNING: Smoking Causes Lung Cancer, Heart Disease, Emphysema And May Complicate Pregnancy.
A small handmade wood and leather case meant to hold one or two cigars.
A small cardboard box for housing snacks.  Sized so you can take it on the go.
A small cardboard box.  No bigger than a foot in dimension.
A sturdy cardboard box, about the size of a banana box.  Great for packing.
A very large cardboard box, the sort children would have loved to hide in, when there were still children.
//: A box that children could hide in should be big enough to cram a (un)dead child or uncomfortable adult in (90x60x60)

description: A very large cardboard box, doubled up with a second layer of cardboard and lots of duct tape.
//: A box that children could hide in should be big enough to cram a (un)dead child or uncomfortable adult in (90x60x60)

description: An oversize cardboard box, big enough to fit some longer items.  Great for storage.
A small wooden box with cap and small handles.
A small wooden box.  Beautifully made, perhaps it could hold something precious.
A hefty wooden box.  Great for storing items.
A small wooden crate.  Sturdy, but still light enough to be moved.
An oversize wooden box, big enough to fit some longer items.  Great for storage.
A small metal box.  It could hold even the densest of items.
A strong metal box.  Great for packing your heaviest items.
A small metal crate.  The slim profile makes storage that little bit easier.
An oversize metal box, big enough to fit some longer items.  The slim profile makes storage that little bit easier.

A galvanized bucket for peanuts, chilled wine, iced beer, lobster, crab legs, French fries, animal feed, farm use, tailgating, crafts, planting flowers, holding gift baskets, containing a fruit basket and herbs, loose item storage or as an ice bucket.
A wooden bucket.  Carefully chiseled out of hardwood log section, almost like a dugout canoe.  Holds 5 liters of water and has wooden handle for carry.

A slim and lightweight insulated plastic bladder worn on the back or within a hydration pouch in a backpack.  It has a large pocket and a capped mouth for filling with liquid with a hose that allows the wearer to drink hands-free.
An aluminum can, like what soda comes in.
A half gallon carton constructed of a paper, aluminum, and plastic laminate.  It has a threaded cap to keep liquid from leaking out.

pocket_data.//: Calculated to keep shelf stable milk fresh for 304 days when sealed

description: A half-gallon carton constructed of thick, waterproof paper.  It has a threaded cap to keep the contents from leaking out.
A cardboard container with 12 individual cavities for storing eggs.
This is a bag of vacuum-packed food.
A small tin can, like what tuna comes in.
//: Represents a 4 cm radius x 5 cm height steel can.

description: A medium tin can, like what soup comes in.
//: Represents a 4 cm radius x 10 cm height steel can.

description: A military-style water canteen with a 1.5 liter capacity.  Commonly worn at the hip.
A Thermos brand vacuum flask.  Built for temperature retention, helps keep things hot or cold.  Contains 1L of liquid.
A fragile clay vessel.  It can be used to make crude impact grenades or to store liquid.
A 15-liter clay pot with three handles for carrying and for pouring.
A bulky and heavy clay pot with a waterproofed hide lid, meant to store water, but can carry other liquids in a pinch.
A small, vacuum formed cup.
An improvised foldable cup made from aluminum foil.  It can contain liquid and is usable for boiling water.
A 250ml laboratory conical flask, with a rubber stopper.
A 10ml laboratory cylindrical test tube, with a rubber stopper.
A 250ml laboratory beaker.  Basically a cup with delusions of grandeur.
A tall, narrow glass cylinder with precise markings for measuring fluid quantities.  An important science tool, it is also useful for anal retentive chefs.

pocket_data.//: sealed_data is here so the container can be sealed to avoid spilling

description: These plastic tubes, with little built in snap-caps, are a great way to store a tiny amount of liquid.  Great for jello shooters if 1mL is enough for a shot for you.  Cool people call these "eppies".
A 250 ml metal flask with a hinged screw-on lid, commonly used to discreetly transport alcohol.
A three-liter glass jar with a metal screw top lid, used for canning.  Preserves content from rot until opened.
A half-liter glass jar with a metal screw top lid, used for canning.  Preserves content from rot until opened (assuming it was sterile before sealing).
A bulky plastic jerrycan, meant to carry fuel, but can carry other liquids in a pinch.
A steel jerrycan, meant to carry fuel, but can carry other liquids in a pinch.
A clay container with a lid, used to hold and pour liquids.
A standard plastic jug used for milk and household cleaning chemicals.  Some may be factory-sealed to increase shelf life.
A reusable lightweight aluminum keg, used for shipping beer.  It has a capacity of 50 liters.
A reusable heavy steel keg, used for shipping beer.  It has a capacity of 50 liters.
The stomach of a large creature, cleaned and sealed with strings.  It can hold 3 liters of water.
A large metal tank for holding liquids.  Useful for crafting.
A small metal tank for gas or liquids.  Useful for crafting.
A water canteen made from wood, secured by metal bands and sealed with wax or pitch.  Holds 1.5 liters and has a simple carry strap.
The stomach of a creature, cleaned and sealed with a string.  It can hold 1.5 liters of water.
A waterproof case designed for a standard smartphone.  Will protect your smartphone from water damage entirely.

name.str: police call box waterproof smartphone case

variants.description: This waterproof smartphone case has a drawing on it that makes it look like an old English police call box.
A black waterproof case designed for a standard smartphone.  Will protect your smartphone from water damage entirely.
A pink waterproof case designed for a standard smartphone.  Will protect your smartphone from water damage entirely.
A red waterproof case designed for a standard smartphone.  Will protect your smartphone from water damage entirely.
A gold waterproof case designed for a standard smartphone.  Will protect your smartphone from water damage entirely.
This waterproof smartphone case has numerous versions of Hello Kitty posing on it.
This waterproof smartphone case has a green zombie on its rear side.  Would using this be in poor taste now?

description: A small watertight leather bag with a carrying strap, can hold 1.5 liters of water.
A watertight leather bag with a carrying strap, can hold 3 liters of water.
A large watertight leather bag with a carrying strap, can hold 5 liters of water.
Traditionally made of white oak; these vessels are known for delivering delicious whiskey to the future.  It has a capacity of 100 liters.
Just a piece of butcher's paper.  Good for starting fires.
A piece of aluminum foil, large enough to wrap around something.  You could also cook food in it.

description.//~: Daizu is Japanese for soy, hence DaiZoom
description.str: "DaiZoom Protein Bar, brought to you by SoyPelusa" is emblazoned proudly upon this greaseproof wrapper.

description: A cheap, disposable cup with a plastic lid and straw.
A big, square plastic bucket usually used for carrying ice cream.
A gentleman's balloon.  A single use life preventer.  A thumbless latex mitten.  This could be used as a makeshift water container, but otherwise it's anyone's guess what it's for.
A child's balloon.  This could be used as a makeshift water container.
A large tin can, like what beans come in.  Holds a substantial amount of food.
An aluminum box designed to contain a small survival kit.
The ultimate survival kit purchased either by the wealthy or the dedicated urban survivalist.  It contains tools and items to help you survive in case of an emergency.

description: A very small cardboard box with tea brand written on it.
A plastic box designed to contain a first aid kit.
A fabric pouch designed to contain a personalized trauma kit.  These supplies are used to address immediate life-threatening conditions.
A small box with an image of a toy car printed on the front.  The text written on the side says it comes with remote control and batteries included.
A small box with an image of a children building things.
A small box with an image of a children building things.  'Makerspace Learner Kit'
A small box with an image of a children building robots.
A small, sturdy, plastic and aluminum container of multi-layered construction, with detailed nutritional information about its contents.
A sturdy plastic and aluminum container of multi-layered construction, with detailed nutritional information about its contents.
The Meal, Ready-to-Eat - also known as the MRE - is an individual field ration.  It is in a lightweight yet sturdy multi-layered plastic and aluminum foil container - essentially a flexible can.
A transparent, watertight plastic bag meant for holding drinks.
A first aid kit designed for patrolling police officers, contents selected for dealing with hemorrhaging injuries such as gunshot wounds.  Comes in a sealed pouch.
A 50 gallon glass aquarium, used for safely storing small animals for use as pets or food.
A 50 gallon glass aquarium, used for safely storing small animals for use as pets or food.  This one has been freshly made and requires time for the silicone to dry.

use_action.msg: You check that the aquarium does indeed hold water, it is ready.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The silicone hasn't dried quite yet.
use_action.//: The time it takes is a week and this appears to be the minimum time the internet says it takes.
